name: The Mortian
author: Sam
description: Piloting ships has never been easier. In this tutorial, you will learn how to get into a ship and shoot yourself to another planet, named Mors for copyright reasons.
briefing:
Find the space ship, and aim for that second planet. Fire your engines until you're going fast enough to reach it, then slow yourself down (by turning around and firing those engines in the opposite direction). 
Once you've landed, climb out and take a deep breath...
